newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Philodrill gets oil stake of Australian firm.
newsitem.headline: Philodrill gets oil stake of Australian firm.

text.p: Philippine oil exploration firm Philodrill Corp said on Tuesday Australia-based Socdet Production Pty Ltd assigned to it 50 percent of Socdet's shares in two oil exploration areas both located in Palawan, southwestern Philippines.

In a letter to the Philippine Stock Exchange, Philodrill said it has accepted the assignment of Socdet's interests in the two exploration areas. Philodrill said it will also assume 50 percent of Socdet's liabilities in both areas.
Last September, Socdet entered into two farm-in agreements to acquire up to 60 percent stake in service contracts 14 and 6B.
No reason was given for Socdet's assigning of the shares to Philodrill.
